definitions.definition: a member of a Germanic people that invaded the Roman Empire from the east between the 3rd and 5th centuries. The eastern division, the Ostrogoths, founded a kingdom in Italy, while the Visigoths went on to found one in Spain.
a style of rock music derived from punk, typically with apocalyptic or mystical lyrics.
a member of a subculture favoring black clothing, white and black makeup, and goth music.
